comments: Ms. Christi was a great professor. Honestly didn\'t care about the projects we did in class (mostly art, gender/race issues), but that was personal. She\'s quite intelligent in the subjects, and always easy to approach. The only problem I had was the grading. I had an A+ on all 4 essay\'s, but left the class with a B. I\'m over it, though.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Get ready to read (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Ms. Gravett\'s curriculum on subjects of race, privilege, and gender will force you to see things about yourself which you won\'t necessarily like, but make no mistake, she\'s not there to judge you. She\'s there to make you think. If you\'re open-minded, you won\'t leave her class the same as when you started. Can\'t wait to take her for Comp 2.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Get ready to read (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Ms. Gravett\'s class is focused around race and gender. Very little is taught in regards to the actual subject. If you can put up with being subjected to her on sided views everyday you can get a good grade. I do not suggest her as a teacher.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Get ready to read (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: The BEST teacher in the world. Loves teaching and very understanding with assignments if you have questions. She answers your emails timely and gives you more than enough time to finish the assignments she assigns. If you dont pass its not her its you. great class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Get ready to read (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: I took her for Creative Writing online and got an A. This was the easiest class I ever had. The class is based on creativity and fun work. Do the work and you will pass. She gives you honest feedback and lets you know what you need to do to improve your writing skills. Overall she gets an A for Awesome.. Take her you will be satisfied.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Get ready to read (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Very easy teacher. Most of everyone got an A in the class. She will not teach you everything that you need to know for future classes with other teachers. The only topics she covers are racism and feminism. She was cool, but there are better English teachers.

Sometimes she sent out an email and sometimes not.

comments: This was a fun class minus the close minded idiots that took the same class as I did. Mrs. Gravett is eager to help and ALWAYS responds to emails quickly! The class has a lot of open discussions about various topics...if you like a good debate then i recommend this class!!! I wish I could take her for Comp II.
